One sample t-test 

Data variable:   sample 

Descriptive statistics: 
            sample
   mean      5.148
   std dev.  2.396

Hypotheses: 
   null:        population mean equals 3.844872 
   alternative: population mean not equal to 3.844872 

Test results: 
   t-statistic:  2.827 
   degrees of freedom:  26 
   p-value:  0.009 

Other information: 
   two-sided 95% confidence interval:  [4.2, 6.096] 
   estimated effect size (Cohen's d):  0.544
